ul.li: 3 Docker swarm Windows worker VM nodes for container workloads (optional). Kubernetes is not yet supported for Windows workers.

body.p: The hybrid deployment will typically add 3 Windows worker nodes to the above configuration, co-located with the Linux workers.
body.note: Some of the application software supported by this configuration does not currently run on Windows, for example, the Sysdig Software Agent (see the section ).
